There is the voice that went
up & down England Latimer was no
chronicler of times past. To Latimer the old
dreams games, the old [songs?] Latimer,

is now at this moment, in King Edward Sixths

[pigs?] bones. The saw He saw the There was
no beauty, it was but only superstition &

were wont to bestow in pilgrimage
matters, in trentalls, in masses, in

when familiar letters are written in –
To disengage the song from its encumberances
becomes as time goes on a task for the
critic – that specially qualified taster who
was not yet in existence when Spenser
emerged at last partially at least from
the depths of anonymity.

and at the same time, forces are at work

outside; Not all his [illeg.]

He was then the first self conscious poet.
The first real poet. And English poetry
might have continued to be a book read aloud
by the leisured in the great hall were had it
not been for the other voice – the voice at the
back door. Ironically [though?], when
Spenser himself heard the voice of the mummers. He

might have continued to be a book read aloud
by the leisured in the great hall were had it
